casebody.data:
IN RE: Judge RIDGEWAY 52P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Bruce L. Gorham, for Gorham, Bruce Lamont.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of February 2019 by Petitioner (Bruce L. Gorham) for Appeal from the NC Judicial Standards Commission:

*425"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
